thread.title: Quaint hotel, great location
thread.title_full: Quaint hotel, great location - Review of Le Relais Montmartre, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: blair114
title: Quaint hotel, great location
text: Stayed here for 3 days with 5 friends. It's quaint and the rooms are a bit small but that's to be expected in an old city like Paris. The location is pretty much right between the Sacre Couer and the Moulin Rouge (kinda ironic?). It's also close to Blanche station on the Metro which makes it easy to see the rest of Paris. Lots of good little restaurants and bars/pubs around . The staff were very friendly and helpful
